messages.subject: Fwd: [unschoolingbasics] Re: Learning to play baseball
messages.msgSnippet: Gee, that  brings up many memories for me! I went to grade school during the late 60`s.  Girls couldn`t wear any kind of pants no matter what the weather
messages.messageBody:
Gee, that brings up many memories for me! I went to grade school during the
late 60`s. Girls couldn`t wear any kind of pants no matter what the weather
was.If it was winter we would wear pants under our dresses and take them off
THE MINUTE that we got to school.I remember the school taking a vote to see
what girls would be allowed to wear. The list had mini skirts, pant suits,etc.
All the boys voted for mini skirts.Just goes to show that no matter how the
world changes, it still stays the same!

Lyn

But, in younger years (1-6 grades), gym
was mostly for running and playing. Of course, back in my grammar
school days, we'd wear 'hot pants' (boy am I dating myself there lol!)
under our skirts so we could change for gym easily and then change
back - jeans weren't allowed at all and I was in 5th grade by the
time 'pant suits' were even allowed.






[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
